data.details:
Food From Afar- BJ
Grades: 2, 3, 4, 5

Are you ready to go on an engineering adventure? Explore new places with Flynn as she travels around the world lending a hand! Flynn needs your help solving problems as they pop up, and helping her get out of trouble by putting your engineering intuition to the test! On this adventure, Flynn is trapped in the rain forest with nothing to eat. Her hunger is growing, and Monkeyâ€™s creativity is lacking. Can you help Flynn to find a way across the ravine to get to the precious star fruit that will satisfy her hunger? They look so delicious! Fun patch included.

*This event is for 2016 registered Girl Scouts, and registered & approved adult volunteers.
* For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings. 
*Girl/adult ratios must be followed and adults are expected to stay on the premises during the event. 
*Event registration closes Feb. 8

$35/girl, $1/adult
Contact: Brittany McCallister 904.389.3071
